lines.speaker: adeline
lines.text: You're here! And you brought the pumpkins, wonderful. I knew I could rely on you, [Ari]. Hayden's crop came up a little short this year.

lines.speaker: adeline
lines.text: Let me just take these and finish up the preparations. Can you go tell Aunt Elsie we're ready to start?

lines.speaker: elsie
lines.text: Good to see you, dear!

choices.text: Hi. Adeline said we're ready to start... whatever this is.

lines.speaker: elsie
lines.text: Why do you look confused?

lines.speaker: elsie
lines.text: Oh, this is your first Halloween with us, isn't it? Well, you're in for a treat!

lines.speaker: elsie
lines.text: Attention, everyone! It's that time again - time for our annual Pumpkin Carving contest! We have some fabulous prizes on offer this year, so do your best!

lines.speaker: elsie
lines.text: First place wins this darling bespoke pumpkin beret, made by our very own Louis! Tres chic!

lines.speaker: celine
lines.text: Oooh, that's so cute! I wonder if my plants would grow better if they thought I was one of them?

lines.speaker: holt
lines.text: Ha! Bespook fashion!

lines.speaker: elsie
lines.text: Second place wins this batch of artisanal pumpkin spice wine!

lines.speaker: holt
lines.text: Hemlock's special recipe? Hoo boy! I drank so much of that good stuff last year, I felt gourd-awful the next morning!

lines.speaker: juniper
lines.text: Oh? How sneaky of you Hemlock, you told me you were all out.

lines.speaker: hemlock
lines.text: That's the last batch, I swear! I'd already set it aside when you asked.

lines.speaker: juniper
lines.text: Is that so? It looks like now I'll need to compete.

lines.speaker: holt
lines.text: Gourd-awful, get it? Anyone?

lines.speaker: elsie
lines.text: ...Moving on, third and last place wins one of Reina's delicious pumpkin pies!

lines.speaker: march
lines.text: These prizes are the same every year.

lines.speaker: olric
lines.text: Yeah! Can't have too much of a good thing!

lines.speaker: valen
lines.text: Holt's cautionary tale seems to suggest otherwise. All things in moderation.

lines.speaker: adeline
lines.text: Thanks for introducing the prizes, Elsie. Now that you know what you're competing for, let's start carving!

lines.speaker: olric
lines.text: Joining our team? Great to have you!

lines.speaker: march
lines.text: It's not a team contest. Only three of us will win.

lines.speaker: juniper
lines.text: Well you certainly won't place, what is that even supposed to be?

lines.speaker: valen
lines.text: Whatever it is, it's better than your Dozy.

lines.speaker: juniper
lines.text: Only because I'm using the same tools as everyone else in the spirit of fairness! I hope your surgical cuts are better than your pumpkin cuts!

lines.speaker: valen
lines.text: They're certainly sharper than your tongue, no matter how much wine whets it.

lines.speaker: march
lines.text: Cut it out you two, you're supposed to be carving pumpkins, not each other.

lines.speaker: balor
lines.text: What's yours supposed to be, Olric? You've barely made any cuts.

lines.speaker: olric
lines.text: A rock!

lines.speaker: march
lines.text: A rock!? If you thought this was a team game then why aren't you trying harder?

lines.speaker: olric
lines.text: It's all about having fun, right Balor?

lines.speaker: balor
lines.text: And the prize.

lines.speaker: juniper
lines.text: Yes, it's the prize.

lines.speaker: olric
lines.text: But we already get a participation trophy?

lines.speaker: valen
lines.text: As if that would satisfy Juniper.

lines.speaker: juniper
lines.text: As if you would know such a thing.

lines.speaker: balor
lines.text: More wine would satisfy me, anyone want another?

lines.speaker: juniper
lines.text: Always!

lines.speaker: valen
lines.text: Sure.

lines.speaker: march
lines.text: Beer, thanks.

lines.speaker: olric
lines.text: Just a milk for me, please!

lines.speaker: juniper
lines.text: (Juniper appears to be chanting under her breath, and doesn't look away from the pumpkin in front of her.) Oh no...

lines.speaker: juniper
lines.text: That... wasn't supposed to happen.

lines.speaker: dell
lines.text: My pumpkin is ruined!

lines.speaker: valen
lines.text: It seems several of the pumpkins are ruined.

lines.speaker: balor
lines.text: Yours survived remarkably intact, though.

lines.speaker: valen
lines.text: I have quick reflexes.

lines.speaker: dell
lines.text: Well, mine didn't! How am I supposed to win now?!

lines.speaker: eiland
lines.text: It's alright, Dell, my pumpkin survived so you can enter it instead.

lines.speaker: dell
lines.text: Really?! Thanks, Eiland!

lines.speaker: adeline
lines.text: Well, with that, uh, accident, I think it's time for the judging to begin!

lines.speaker: dell
lines.text: I'm gonna win that 2nd place prize, then give it to Juniper! She said she'll trade me for a potion to turn into a frog!

lines.speaker: elsie
lines.text: Due to the unfortunate incident that tragically cut our entries short, I'm afraid that everyone without a viable pumpkin will need to be disqualified.

lines.speaker: elsie
lines.text: And Juniper? I'm sure you won't mind helping with the mess you made, hmm?

lines.speaker: juniper
lines.text: Yeah, yeah, I'll help out...

lines.speaker: elsie
lines.text: Wonderful! Now, let's make a start!

lines.speaker: ryis
lines.text: First up is Henrietta's entry...

lines.speaker: ryis
lines.text: Is that... an egg?

lines.speaker: hayden
lines.text: Of course it is! My girl is an artist!

lines.speaker: ryis
lines.text: Well it's certainly very... avant garde.

lines.speaker: march
lines.text: I think she was just eating the pumpkin.

lines.speaker: josephine
lines.text: Wow, there's certainly some... interesting pumpkins here.

lines.speaker: maple
lines.text: I like Hayden's, it's so cute!

lines.speaker: elsie
lines.text: I've seen many carved pumpkins in my time but few compare to these ones.

lines.speaker: ryis
lines.text: What's yours, [Ari]?

lines.speaker: maple
lines.text: I thought it was a cloud?

lines.speaker: elsie
lines.text: Now, now, enough of that! Please excuse us, we have much to discuss!

lines.speaker: josephine
lines.text: The winner for third place is... Eiland! Or, Dell, I suppose. Your prize is one of Reina's delicious pumpkin pies!

lines.speaker: dell
lines.text: Yes!!! Now I can be a frog!

lines.speaker: juniper
lines.text: Sorry, kiddo, but I wanted the wine, not the pie. I bet you're regretting giving her your pumpkin now, aren't you, Eiland?

lines.speaker: eiland
lines.text: A-Ah of course not... what kind of monster would regret giving up a delicious, limited edition Fall dessert to a child...

lines.speaker: dell
lines.text: It's okay, if Juniper won't trade me we can share the pie instead! Captain Dell always pays her crew well!

lines.speaker: ryis
lines.text: For second place, the much anticipated Pumpkin Spiced Wine goes to...

lines.speaker: ryis
lines.text: Valen!

lines.speaker: valen
lines.text: Naturally, of course, and no, Juniper, I will not be sharing. Unless you ask nicely.

lines.speaker: juniper
lines.text: As if I could be tempted with such a superficial offering.

lines.speaker: valen
lines.text: Is that why your hand is on the bottle?

lines.speaker: elsie
lines.text: Saving the best for last, time for the final prize - the coveted Pumpkin Beret! Drumroll please, first place goes to...

lines.speaker: elsie
lines.text: Hayden!

lines.speaker: hayden
lines.text: Oh! Thank you! Henrietta will be so happy!

lines.speaker: josephine
lines.text: Congratulations, Hayden!

lines.speaker: elsie
lines.text: Here is your prize, I'm sure Henrietta will be the height of fashion sporting such a beautiful beret! And that's a wrap folks! Let's hope there won't be too many accidents next year.

lines.speaker: adeline
lines.text: Wait, [Ari]!, I- no, all of us wanted to thank you for all your hard work helping Mistria recover. I'm so glad you joined us.

lines.speaker: adeline
lines.text: You've breathed new life into this village, and we couldn't have done all this without you. I made you a little treat as a thank you, I hope you like it

lines.speaker: adeline
lines.text: Happy Halloween, [Ari]. I’m excited for next year's contest already.
